alert.note: Alert for Delta (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN DELTA COUNTY THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rock, or 21 miles north of Escanaba, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Gladstone, Rapid River, Rock, U.S. 41 between Trenary and Rapid River, Brampton, Ensign, Maplewood, and Perkins. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
